entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Gonzales 9:00 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 9:10 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait in the morning and early in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 9:10 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
